ImageWalker

Core Modules

Основные модули ядра ImageWalker.

Main Application

main()[source]

Main entry point for the ImageWalker application.

Initializes the WalkerService, configures filters, and executes file sorting.

Raises:

Exception – If any error occurs during the sorting process.

Bases: ABC

Abstract base class representing a node in the file system hierarchy.

Parameters:

  • path (str)

name

Name of the file system node.

path

Full path to the file system node.

  • name (str)

  • path (str)

class Directory(name, path)[source]

Bases: FileSystemNode

Represents a directory in the file system.

Parameters:

  • path (str)

subdirectories

List of subdirectories within this directory.

files

List of files contained in this directory.

__init__(name, path)[source]
Parameters:

  • name (str)

  • path (str)

add_subdirectory(directory)[source]

Adds a subdirectory to this directory.

Parameters:

directory (Directory) – Directory instance to add as subdirectory.

add_file(file)[source]

Adds a file to this directory.

Parameters:

file (File) – File instance to add to directory.

find_directory(path_parts)[source]

Recursively finds a directory by path parts.

Parameters:

path_parts (List[str]) – List of directory names representing the path.

Return type:

Optional[Directory]

Returns:

Directory instance if found, None otherwise.

class FileFactory[source]

Bases: object

Factory class for creating File objects with appropriate metadata.

static create_file(file_path)[source]

Creates a File object with appropriate metadata based on file type.

Parameters:

file_path (str) – Path to the file to be processed.

Return type:

File

Returns:

File object with populated metadata.

Raises:

FileNotFoundError – If the specified file does not exist.

static _get_image_dimensions(file_path)[source]

Extracts dimensions from image files.

Parameters:

file_path (str) – Path to the image file.

Return type:

Tuple[int, int]

Returns:

Tuple of (width, height) in pixels.

static _get_video_info(file_path)[source]

Extracts duration and resolution from video files.

Parameters:

file_path (str) – Path to the video file.

Return type:

Tuple[float, Tuple[int, int]]

Returns:

Tuple of (duration_seconds, (width, height)).

static _get_audio_duration(file_path)[source]

Extracts duration from audio files.

Parameters:

file_path (str) – Path to the audio file.

Return type:

float

Returns:

Duration in seconds.

static _get_document_info(file_path)[source]

Extracts information from document files.

Parameters:

file_path (str) – Path to the document file.

Return type:

int

Returns:

Estimated page count for the document.
